name: Beat the shit out of the coronavirus VR
name_original: Beat the shit out of the coronavirus VR
description:
Beat the shit out of the coronavirus.

  • Thumbsticks forward/backwards: move where you're looking. Hold down forward on both to go faster.
  • Thumbsticks left/right: quick turn 30 degrees
  • Grip button: make fist/grab virus
  • A button: spawn more viruses

Instructions

Make fist punch virus. Grab virus punch virus. Grab virus smash into floor. Grab virus smash into wall. Grab virus smash into other virus. Beat the shit out of the coronavirus. 

Thoughts

How do you feel some semblance of control against a virus? A hated thing you can't see, can't understand; something that has twisted the world's worlds into something strange and different. How can you put those feelings into words? Maybe you can't, really. Maybe we struggle with lexical expression for this scenario, our expression system in the dark for dealing with literal earth-altering events. Even our bodies, evolved for fight or flight, struggle, here, to do either. Well, not now. Using the height of embodied technology, now you can outlet your feelings. Now you can beat the shit out of the coronavirus.
